upnp_disabled.description:
Unable to connect to Sonos speaker at {device_ip}.

Please ensure UPnP is enabled on your Sonos system.

Open the Sonos app on your phone or tablet. Go to Account > Privacy and Security > UPnP. Enable the UPnP setting. Once UPnP is enabled, return to Home Assistant and reload the Sonos integration. The connection should now succeed. See our [documentation]({documentation_url}) for steps to resolve this issue.
upnp_disabled.title: Networking error: UPnP disabled
